issue.title: [R] Pull groups from grouped_df into RecordBatch or Table
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11769](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11769). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be nice if
```java

iris %>% group_by(Species) %>% record_batch() 
```
returned the same thing as
```java

iris %>% record_batch() %>% group_by(Species) 
```
instead of losing the groups.
